name: Clickery Life_Click Die Repeat_alpha v.0.8.06
description:
Why worry about jobs, money, and debts in real life when you can do it all in this game!

v.0.8.06

More Features & Balances changed
- Now you can buy items by 1X, 10X, 100X, or MAX!
- (Took me only 4 weeks to implement this feature!)
- (I'm not a professional programmer, Okay?)
- (Crying in the corner)

=====================================================

- DON'T FORGET TO SAVE BEFORE QUITTING!

- Goal: Collect money to buy Karma (Prestige Point) on Legacy Tab. After death, use Karma to upgrade character for the next life.

- Thanks for playing! The game is still in development. All feedback is welcome.
